articles.description: SRH bowling Dale Steyn revealed an interesting chat that took place between him and Bhuvneshwar during the season, which convinced the SA legend that there was fire in the India quick's belly.
articles.content: At 32, Bhuvneshwar Kumar is still pretty much a solid performer. He may not be an automatic selection in India's Playing XI but the right-arm pacer on Sunday proved why he cannot be counted out just … [+1841 chars]

articles.content: No. 1 Daniil Medvedev, +1 (Joint Career High)The 26-year-old has soared back to No. 1 in the Pepperstone ATP Rankings, regaining the position he held for three weeks in March this year. Last week, Me… [+2072 chars]

articles.title: From Labuschagne to Theekshana: six players to watch - ESPNcricinfo
